languages.text: "Пусть и случается это раз в поколение, но даже до Тассеры время от времени долетают корабли, Звездное Сиятельство. Как-то к нам прибыла целая делегация иноземцев с механическими музыкантами. И эти музыканты нам так понравились! Барахлят уже, правда, — влажный воздух Тассеры пагубно влияет на их сохранность, а {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}священных мужей в алых робах{/g} у нас больше нет. Только и остается что самим молитвы возносить, маслами окуривать и делать так, как в летописях записано, без понимания..."

traits.locale_text: "Даже до Тессеры время от времени долетают корабли, Ваше Сиятельство. Как-то к нам прибыла целая делегация иноземцев с заводными музыкантами. И эти музыканты нам так понравились!"

languages.text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."
languages.original_text: "Пусть и случается это раз в поколение, но даже до Тассеры время от времени долетают корабли, Звездное Сиятельство. Как-то к нам прибыла целая делегация иноземцев с механическими музыкантами. И эти музыканты нам так понравились! Барахлят уже, правда, — влажный воздух Тассеры пагубно влияет на их сохранность, а {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}священных мужей в алых робах{/g} у нас больше нет. Только и остается что самим молитвы возносить, маслами окуривать и делать так, как в летописях записано, без понимания..."

traits.locale_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

"Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

"Even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. Once, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these clockwork performers in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our musicians have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad holy man or woman{/g} anymore. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

languages.text: 「たとえ一世代に一度あるかないかであっても、タッセーラにも時々お客様がいらっしゃるのですよ、天の閣下。かつて、異星からの全権使節団が、このオーケストラを引き連れてやって来たことがありました。私たちはたちまち彼らに夢中になってしまいました！残念ながら、私たちの楽師たちは今や見るも無残な有様です。ご存じのとおり、タッセーラの湿度の高い空気では彼らの保存が難しいのです。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}紅の法衣{/g}をまとう聖者も今では一人も残っておりません。今の私たちにできるのは、自分たちで祈りを捧げ、香油を焚き、古文書に書かれていることを一通り実践することだけです。たとえその意味がまったく理解できなくとも…」
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: 「たとえ一世代に一度あるかないかであっても、タッセーラにも時々お客様がいらっしゃるのですよ、天の閣下。かつて、異星からの全権使節団が、このサーヴィターのオーケストラを引き連れてやって来たことがありました。私たちはたちまち彼らに夢中になってしまいました！残念ながら、私たちの楽師たちは今や見るも無残な有様です。ご存じのとおり、タッセーラの湿度の高い空気では彼らの保存が難しいのです。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}紅の法衣{/g}をまとう聖者も今では一人も残っておりません。今の私たちにできるのは、自分たちで祈りを捧げ、香油を焚き、古文書に書かれていることを一通り実践することだけです。たとえその意味がまったく理解できなくとも…」

「タッセーラにも、時にはお客様がいらっしゃるのですよ、天の閣下。かつて、異星からの全権使節団が、この機械仕掛けの芸人たちを引き連れてやって来たことがありました。私たちはたちまち彼らに夢中になってしまいました！残念ながら、私たちの楽師たちは今や見るも無残な有様です。ご存じのとおり、タッセーラの湿度の高い空気では彼らの保存が難しいのです。紅の法衣をまとう聖者も今では一人も残っておりません。今の私たちにできるのは、自分たちで祈りを捧げ、香油を焚き、古文書に書かれていることを一通り実践することだけです。たとえその意味がまったく理解できなくとも…」

「タッセーラにも、時にはお客様がいらっしゃるのですよ、天の閣下。かつて、異星からの全権使節団が、この機械仕掛けの芸人たちを引き連れてやって来たことがありました。私たちはたちまち彼らに夢中になってしまいました！残念ながら、私たちの楽師たちは今や見るも無残な有様です。ご存じのとおり、タッセーラの湿度の高い空気では彼らの保存が難しいのです。紅の法衣をまとう聖者も今では一人も残っておりません。今の私たちにできるのは、自分たちで祈りを捧げ、香油を焚き、古文書に書かれていることを一通り実践することだけです。たとえその意味がまったく理解できなくとも…」

languages.text: «Incluso Thassera recibe visitas de vez en cuando, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, aunque solo sea una vez en cada generación. En una ocasión, una delegación de un mundo extranjero trajo estos músicos mecánicos. ¡Enseguida nos quedamos prendados de ellos! Por desgracia, nuestros intérpretes están en un estado lamentable. El clima húmedo de Thassera dificulta su correcta conservación, y ya no disponemos de ningún clérigo de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}hábito carmesí{/g}. Lo único que podemos hacer es elevar nuestras propias plegarias, quemar óleos sagrados y hacer todo lo que reza en las antiguas escrituras, aun cuando escapan a nuestra comprensión...».
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso Thassera recibe visitas de vez en cuando, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, aunque solo sea una vez en cada generación. En una ocasión, una delegación de un mundo extranjero trajo estos músicos mecánicos. ¡Enseguida nos quedamos prendados de ellos! Por desgracia, nuestros intérpretes están en un estado lamentable. El clima húmedo de Thassera dificulta su correcta conservación, y ya no disponemos de ningún clérigo de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}hábito carmesí{/g}. Lo único que podemos hacer es elevar nuestras propias plegarias, quemar óleos sagrados y hacer todo lo que reza en las antiguas escrituras, aun cuando escapan a nuestra comprensión...».

«Incluso Thassera recibe visitas de vez en cuando, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, aunque solo sea una vez en cada generación. En una ocasión, una delegación de un mundo extranjero trajo esta orquesta de servidores consigo. ¡Enseguida nos quedamos prendados de ellos! Por desgracia, nuestros músicos están en un estado lamentable. El clima húmedo de Thassera dificulta su correcta conservación, y ya no disponemos de ningún clérigo de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}hábito carmesí{/g}. Lo único que podemos hacer es elevar nuestras propias plegarias, quemar óleos sagrados y hacer todo lo que reza en las antiguas escrituras, aun cuando escapan a nuestra comprensión...».

«Incluso Thassera recibe visitas de vez en cuando, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. En una ocasión, una delegación de un mundo extranjero trajo consigo estos músicos mecánicos. ¡Enseguida nos quedamos prendados de ellos! Por desgracia, nuestros músicos están en un estado lamentable. El clima húmedo de Thassera dificulta su correcta conservación, y ya no disponemos de ningún {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}clérigo de hábito carmesí{/g}. Lo único que podemos hacer es elevar nuestras propias plegarias, quemar óleos sagrados y hacer todo lo que reza en las antiguas escrituras, aun cuando escapan a nuestra comprensión...».

languages.text: "Genellikle her nesilde en fazla bir kes olsa da Thassera'ya bile zaman zaman misafir gelir Semavi Efendimiz. Bir keresinde yabancı bir dünyadan koca bir heyet, yanlarında bu mekanik müzisyenlerle gelmişti. Onlara nasıl vurulmuştuk! Ne yazık ki sanatçılarımız şimdilerde acınacak hâlde. Thassera'nın nemli havası, korunmalarını zorlaştırıyor. Elimizde {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}kızıla bürünmüş{/g} kutsal kimse kalmadı. Artık tek yapabildiğimiz; kendi dualarımızı etmek, yağ yakmak ve anlamasak bile eski yazılarda ne yazıyorsa onu yapmak..."
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: "Genellikle her nesilde en fazla bir kes olsa da Thassera'ya bile zaman zaman misafir gelir Semavi Efendimiz. Bir keresinde yabancı bir dünyadan koca bir heyet, yanlarında bu mekanik müzisyenlerle gelmişti. Onlara nasıl vurulmuştuk! Ne yazık ki sanatçılarımız şimdilerde acınacak hâlde. Thassera'nın nemli havası, korunmalarını zorlaştırıyor. Elimizde {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}kızıla bürünmüş{/g} kutsal kimse kalmadı. Artık tek yapabildiğimiz; kendi dualarımızı etmek, yağ yakmak ve anlamasak bile eski yazılarda ne yazıyorsa onu yapmak..."

"Genellikle her nesilde en fazla bir kes olsa da Thassera'ya bile zaman zaman misafir gelir Semavi Efendimiz. Bir keresinde yabancı bir dünyadan koca bir heyet, yanlarında bu hizmetör orkestrasıyla gelmişti. Onlara nasıl vurulmuştuk! Ne yazık ki müzisyenlerimiz şimdilerde acınacak hâlde. Thassera'nın nemli havası, korunmalarını zorlaştırıyor. Elimizde {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}kızıla bürünmüş{/g} kutsal kimse kalmadı. Artık tek yapabildiğimiz; kendi dualarımızı etmek, yağ yakmak ve anlamasak bile eski yazılarda ne yazıyorsa onu yapmak..."

languages.text: « Même si cela n'arrive généralement qu'une fois par génération, Thassera reçoit occasionnellement des visites, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Un jour, une délégation en provenance d'un monde étranger est arrivée avec ces musiciens mécaniques dans leur sillage et nous sommes immédiatement tombés sous leur charme ! Hélas, nos artistes sont aujourd'hui dans un piteux état. L'humidité de l'air thasserien rend leur préservation difficile et nous n'avons plus le moindre saint homme ou sainte femme {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}vêtu de rouge{/g}. Il ne nous reste d'autre choix que de prier, de brûler des huiles et de faire tout ce que préconisent les écrits anciens, même si nous n'avons aucun espoir d'en comprendre le sens... »
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: « Même si cela n'arrive généralement qu'une fois par génération, Thassera reçoit occasionnellement des visites, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Un jour, une délégation en provenance d'un monde étranger est arrivée avec ces musiciens mécaniques dans leur sillage et nous sommes immédiatement tombés sous leur charme ! Hélas, nos artistes sont aujourd'hui dans un piteux état. L'humidité de l'air thasserien rend leur préservation difficile et nous n'avons plus le moindre saint homme ou sainte femme {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}vêtu de rouge{/g}. Il ne nous reste d'autre choix que de prier, de brûler des huiles et de faire tout ce que préconisent les écrits anciens, même si nous n'avons aucun espoir d'en comprendre le sens... »

« Même si cela n'arrive généralement qu'une fois par génération, Thassera reçoit occasionnellement des visites, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Un jour, une délégation en provenance d'un monde étranger est arrivée avec cet orchestre de servitors dans son sillage et nous sommes immédiatement tombés sous leur charme ! Hélas, nos musiciens sont aujourd'hui dans un piteux état. L'humidité de l'air thasserien rend leur préservation difficile et nous n'avons plus le moindre saint homme ou sainte femme {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}vêtu de rouge{/g}. Il ne nous reste d'autre choix que de prier, de brûler des huiles et de faire tout ce que préconisent les écrits anciens, même si nous n'avons aucun espoir d'en comprendre le sens... »

« Même Thassera reçoit occasionnellement des visites, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ces artistes mécaniques sont arrivés dans le sillage d'une délégation en provenance d'un monde étranger et nous sommes immédiatement tombés sous leur charme ! Hélas, nos musiciens sont aujourd'hui dans un piteux état. L'humidité de l'air thasserien rend leur préservation difficile et nous n'avons plus le moindre saint homme ou sainte femme {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}vêtu de rouge{/g}. Il ne nous reste d'autre choix que de prier, de brûler des huiles et de faire tout ce que préconisent les écrits anciens, même si nous n'avons aucun espoir d'en comprendre le sens... »

languages.text: "Selbst Thassera bekommt ab und an Besuch, Eure himmlische Hoheit ... auch wenn es nur einmal pro Generation der Fall ist. Einst traf eine ganze Delegation einer fremden Welt mit diesen mechanischen Musikanten im Schlepptau ein. Wir waren sofort von ihnen begeistert! Leider ist der Zustand unserer Künstler mittlerweile mehr als bedauernswert. Die feuchte Luft auf Thassera erschwert ihre Instandhaltung, und wir haben keine {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}in Purpur gewandeten{/g} heiligen Männer oder Frauen mehr. Wir können also nur noch selbst beten, Öle verbrennen und alles andere tun, was in den alten Schriften steht, obwohl wir nicht hoffen dürfen, sie jemals zu verstehen ..."
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Thassera bekommt ab und an Besuch, Eure himmlische Hoheit ... auch wenn es nur einmal pro Generation der Fall ist. Einst traf eine ganze Delegation einer fremden Welt mit diesen mechanischen Musikanten im Schlepptau ein. Wir waren sofort von ihnen begeistert! Leider ist der Zustand unserer Künstler mittlerweile mehr als bedauernswert. Die feuchte Luft auf Thassera erschwert ihre Instandhaltung, und wir haben keine {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}in Purpur gewandeten{/g} heiligen Männer oder Frauen mehr. Wir können also nur noch selbst beten, Öle verbrennen und alles andere tun, was in den alten Schriften steht, obwohl wir nicht hoffen dürfen, sie jemals zu verstehen ..."

"Selbst Thassera bekommt ab und an Besuch, Eure himmlische Hoheit ... auch wenn es nur einmal pro Generation der Fall ist. Einst traf eine ganze Delegation einer fremden Welt mit diesem Servitorenorchester im Schlepptau ein. Wir waren sofort von ihnen begeistert! Leider ist der Zustand unserer Musiker mittlerweile mehr als bedauernswert. Die feuchte Luft auf Thassera erschwert ihre Instandhaltung, und wir haben keine {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}in Purpur gewandeten{/g} heiligen Männer oder Frauen mehr. Wir können also nur noch selbst beten, Öle verbrennen und alles andere tun, was in den alten Schriften steht, obwohl wir nicht hoffen dürfen, sie jemals zu verstehen ..."

languages.text: “即便是塔瑟拉这种地方，偶尔也会有客人来访，尽管可能得等上一辈子才能等到，来自上界的大人。之前，某个来自异域的代表团带着这些机械乐师来到这里，我们立刻就被迷住了！但遗憾的是，这些乐师如今状态堪忧。塔瑟拉空气潮湿，很难保障他们处于最佳状态。如您所知，我们这里没有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}身穿深红色长袍{/g}的圣人。因此，我们唯一能做的事情，就是献上我们的祈祷，点燃圣油，按照古书上的步骤一步步照做，尽管我们根本无法理解那些仪式的含义……”
languages.original_text: "Though at most only once in a generation, even Thassera receives visits from time to time, Your Celestial Highness. One day, an entire delegation from a foreign world arrived with these mechanical musicians in tow. We were immediately smitten with them! Sadly, our performers have now fallen into a sorry state. Thassera's humid air makes their preservation difficult, you see, and we don't have a single {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson-clad{/g} holy man or woman left. All we can do now is offer up prayers of our own, burn oils, and do everything else the old writings say, even though we have no hope of understanding them..."

traits.locale_text: “即便是塔瑟拉这种地方，偶尔也会有客人来访，尽管可能得等上一辈子才能等到，来自上界的大人。之前，某个来自异域的代表团带着这些机械乐师来到这里，我们立刻就被迷住了！但遗憾的是，这些乐师如今状态堪忧。塔瑟拉空气潮湿，很难保障他们处于最佳状态。如您所知，我们这里没有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}身穿深红色长袍{/g}的圣人。因此，我们唯一能做的事情，就是献上我们的祈祷，点燃圣油，按照古书上的步骤一步步照做，尽管我们根本无法理解那些仪式的含义……”

“即便是塔瑟拉这种地方，偶尔也会有客人来访，尽管可能得等上一辈子才能等到，来自上界的大人。之前，某个来自异域的代表团带着这支机仆乐队来到这里，我们立刻就被迷住了！但遗憾的是，这些音乐大师如今状态堪忧。塔瑟拉空气潮湿，很难保障他们处于最佳状态。如您所知，我们这里没有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}身穿深红色长袍{/g}的圣人。因此，我们唯一能做的事情，就是献上我们的祈祷，点燃圣油，按照古书上的步骤一步步照做，尽管我们根本无法理解那些仪式的含义……”

“即便是塔瑟拉这种地方，也时不时会有客人来访，来自上界的大人。之前，某个来自异域的代表团带着这支发条乐队来到这里，我们立刻就被迷住了！但遗憾的是，这些音乐大师如今状态堪忧。塔瑟拉空气潮湿，很难保障他们处于最佳状态。如您所知，我们这里没有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}身穿深红色长袍{/g}的圣人。因此，我们唯一能做的事情，就是献上我们的祈祷，点燃圣油，按照古书上的步骤一步步照做，尽管我们根本无法理解那些仪式的含义……”
